title: Filter authoring info for Building Scene Layer
description: The filter authoring info object contains metadata about the authoring process for creating a filter object. This allows the authoring client to save specific, overridable settings.  The next time it is accessed via an authoring client, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it. Includes properties such as enabled categories or slider.

enum-description.checkbox: Allows client to build UI using checkbox for each filter value presented to the user.

type.description: Declares type or authoring infoilter style of type wire frame.

filterTypes.description: Array of defined filter types. Each filter type has an array of filter values.

examples.title: Building Scene Layer filter authoring info
